# PyRate scripts framework
## Please refer to https://github.com/dsilvestro/PyRate/tree/master/tutorials

# 01 - Defining the preservation model:
PyRate.py Canidae_N_america_PyRate.py -qShift nalmas.txt -PPmodeltest
## You can set the -qShift to any .txt with your time windows of interest

# 02 - Diversification and preservation alayses:
PyRate.py Canidae_N_america_PyRate.py -mG -A 4 -qShift nalmas.txt -n 30000000 -s 10000 -log_sp_q_rates -out rep_1  -j j > canidae_nam_j.txt

# 03- Extract true times of speciation and extinction (needed for PyRateContinuous and R script 04):
PyRate.py -ginput Canidae_N_america_jrep_j_Grj_mcmc.log -b 100
## this creates j _se_ext.txt files for j replicas

# 04 - PyRateContinuous:
## R script 12_Competition_metrics.R advises how to create separate directories for PyRateContinuous setup
### Model setting and testing
PyRateContinuous.py -d Canidae_N_america_jrep_j_Grj_se_est.txt -m m -c time_series.txt -A 1
PyRateContinuous.py -mL ./pyrate_mcmc_logs -b 100

## 05 - Analysis:
python3 PyRateContinuous.py -d Canidae_N_america_jrep_j_Grj_se_est.txt -m 1 -c time_series.txt -n 30000000 -s 10000 -stimes 34 23 5 2 -equal_G 0 -equal_R 0
